title: Não consigo sincronizar nova instalação para obter os dados antigos
content: Boa noite! Parece que meu Firefox atualizou e surgiu umas opções relativas à contas mas depois sumiram todas minhas configurações. Estou tentando sincronizar na minha conta Firefox para baixar minha configurações, favoritos e extensões, mas não consigo. Poderiam me auxiliar? Desde já agradeço.
creator: leoviol

title: All external links open in the same tab.
content:
I want links that I open (in Firefox, from Firefox, like opening any normal link) to open in the same tab (unless otherwise specific, like a normal browser should work), and all links from other applications to open in a new tab.

Whenever I click a link, it overrides my current tab, even if I'm working on something important. Apps do not always make it obvious what might be a URL. Windows for instance LOVES to open up "support" links in your browser. Firefox also does this itself with its update function, it opens up its update notification by overwriting your previous tab.

This is a really, really basic feature that should really be a default setting, but it doesn't seem to exist in settings at all.
creator: lamarche.nj

title: I updated my Mac with Sequoia and have lost all bookmarks, passwords, archived email
content: I updated my Mac with Sequoia and have lost all bookmarks, passwords, archived email

title: Firefox to open mail.google.com
content: Hi there, I login to outlook and gmail every time I open firefox. I have chosen outlook as the default for clicking a link that opens email. And in my gmail tab it keeps asking me if I want to open it instead. Well no I don't but all I can click is "not now" and then it keeps pestering me every time I open firefox. Is there an option like "not ever, please go away"? How can I stop the question. Thanks for you time on this one.
creator: ShishiShabbat
